name: SystemReason
title: System Reason
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent system-specific reasons for when a patient does not receive a therapy or service.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) attribute related to Negation Rationale.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with system-specific reasons for not receiving a therapy or service.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Drug not available - out of stock (finding)
Finding related to health insurance issues (finding)
